svg.title: Electronic Circuits & Networks - Unit III: AC Circuit Analysis
svg.desc: Comprehensive diagram covering AC circuit analysis fundamentals including sinusoidal waveforms, phasor representation, impedance concepts, and power analysis. Course: 4331101 Electronic Circuits & Networks — Unit-III
svg.text: V = Vm∠φ = Vm(cos φ + j sin φ)
Key Steps in AC Circuit Analysis:
1. Convert all elements to phasor/impedance form
2. Apply circuit analysis techniques (KVL, KCL, nodal, mesh)
3. Solve for phasor quantities, then convert back to time domain if needed
• Power Factor: cos φ = P/S = R/|Z|
